# Interface RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface

Interface for configuring remote text embedder. Used for cloud-based text embedding services.

interface RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface {  
apiKey: string;  
modelName: string;  
provider?: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

apiKey modelName provider?

## Properties

### apiKey

apiKey: string

API key for accessing the remote embedding service

### modelName

modelName: string

Model name to use for generating embeddings

### `Optional`provider

provider?: string

Provider name (defaults to DEFAULT_PROVIDER if not specified).

#### Default


```
inworld

```

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
